mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, nickname, realName, username, avatar, password, sex, email, phone, identify, roleId, isDel, createDt, remark) values (#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{realName}, #{username}, #{avatar}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{identify}, #{roleId}, #{isDel}, #{createDt}, #{remark})
mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password} limit 1
